auth.loadingLabel: We are authenticating this session. Please, wait

updateEServiceDescription.loading: We are updating the e-service description

outcome.error: E-service description not updated. Try again.
outcome.success: E-service description updated correctly

outcome.error: E-service version could not be exported. Try again, please!
The e-service import could not be completed. Please check the file and try again.
outcome.success: The e-service was imported successfully

outcome.error: Draft could not be created. Make sure you have filled all the required fields and try again!
Draft could not be updated. Make sure you have filled all the required fields and try again!

outcome.success: Draft deleted successfully
outcome.error: Draft could not be deleted. Try again, please!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm draft deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this draft will be deleted and it will not be recoverable. It will always be possible to create new drafts

outcome.success: E-service cloned successfully and available as a draft
outcome.error: E-service could not be cloned. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm e-service cloning
confirmDialog.description: A new e-service will be created as a draft. It will have the same features as the e-service it is cloned from

createVersionDraft.loading: Creating draft of new e-service version

outcome.success: New e-service version draft created successfully
outcome.error: A new e-service version draft could not be created. Make sure all the required fields are filled in in the original e-service and try again, please!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm e-service version draft creation
confirmDialog.description: A new draft version of the selected e-service will be created

updateVersionDraft.loading: Updateing draft of new e-service version

outcome.success: New e-service version draft updated successfully
outcome.error: The new e-service version draft could not be updated. Make sure all the required fields are filled in in the original e-service and try again, please!

outcome.success: New e-service version published successfully
outcome.error: The new e-service version could not be published. Make sure the API document has been uploaded and try again, please!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm draft publishing
confirmDialog.description: You will not be able to delete an e-service version after it is published. It will also become available in the e-service catalog. It will always be possible to suspend it or make it deprecated when a new version is published

publishDelegatedVersionDraft.loading: We are forwarding the version to the delegator

outcome.success: New e-service version was forwarded to the delegator to approve its publication
outcome.error: It was not possible to forward the new e-service version to the delegator for approval. Please try again!

confirmDialog.title: Request new eservice version publication
confirmDialog.description: You are about to forward to {{delegatorName}} the request to publish a new version of the {{eserviceName}} e-service.

outcome.success: New risk analysis added successfully
outcome.error: The risk analysis could not be added. Please make sure this risk analysis exists and try again!

outcome.success: New risk analysis updated successfully
outcome.error: The new risk analysis could not be updated. Make sure all the required fields are filled in the original risk analysis and try again, please!

deleteEServiceRiskAnalysis.loading: Removing the risk analysis from this e-service

outcome.success: Risk analysis removed successfully
outcome.error: The risk analysis could not be removed from the e-service. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.description: The risk analysis will be deleted from this e-service.

outcome.success: E-service version suspended successfully

outcome.success: E-service version reactivated successfully
outcome.error: The e-service version could not be reactivated. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm version reactivation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm",  this e-service version will be reactivated. All the Subscribers that have an active fruition request for this e-service version will be able to access it

confirmDialog.title: Revoke declared attribtue
confirmDialog.description: Are you sure you want to revoke the attribute?

outcome.error: The request could not be created. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Fruition request
confirmDialog.description: You are about to send a furition request for the e-service {{name}}, version {{version}}

submitDraft.loading: Sending fruition request to the Provider

outcome.success: Request sent successfully and awating approval by the Provider
outcome.error: The request could not be sent. Please, try again!

description.default: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be sent to the e-service provider to be evaluated
description.isDelegated: By clicking on "confirm", the request for use will be forwarded to the e-service provider for approval and a notification will be forwarded to the delegating body for information.

outcome.success: The requested fruition request has been activated successfully
outcome.error: The request could not be activated. Please, try again

confirmDialog.title: Confirm activation fruition request
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will activated. Your party is the e-service's provider, no attribute checking or approval is required

outcome.success: Request deleted successfully
outcome.error: The request could not be deleted. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the draft of this fruition request will be deleted. You will always be able to create a new one

outcome.success: Draft updated successfully
outcome.error: Draft could not be updated. Make sure you have filled all the required fields and try again!
The document could not be downloaded. Please, try again!
The document could not be uploaded. Please, try again!

outcome.success: Document deleted successfully
outcome.error: The document could not be deleted. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The fruition request was activated successfully
outcome.error: The fruition request could not be activated. Please, make sure all attributes are verified and try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be activated. It can be suspended anytime from this page

outcome.error: The fruition request could not be rejected. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The fruition request was suspended successfully. The Subscriber can no longer access this e-service
outcome.error: The fruition request could not be suspended. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request suspension
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be suspended. It will no longer be possible to the clients added to purposes for this e-service to access it. The request can be reactivated anytime from this page

outcome.success: The fruition request was archived successfully
outcome.error: The fruition request could not be archived. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm request archiving
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the fruition request will be archived

outcome.success: The fruition request was upgraded to the latest e-service version
outcome.error: The fruition request could not be upgraded. Please, try again!

outcome.success: Agreement cloned successfully and available as a draft
outcome.error: Agreement could not be cloned. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm agreement cloning
confirmDialog.description: A new agreement will be created as a draft with the same features as the agreement it is cloned from. Remember to integrate the documentation with what is requested by the producer before submitting it again

outcome.error: The fruition request document could not be downloaded. Please, try again!

The purpose draft could not be updated. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The purpose draft was deleted successfully
outcome.error: The purpose draft could not be deleted. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this purpose will be deleted and it will not be recoverable. All the clients added to it will no longer be able to access the Provider e-service. It will always be possible to create new purposes

outcome.error: The purpose draft could not be created. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The daily calls updated successfully.
outcome.error: The daily calls could not be updated. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The purpose was suspended successfully. All associated clients can no longer access the e-service
outcome.error: The purpose could not be suspended. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose suspension
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this purpose will be suspended. All the clients added to it will no longer be able to access the Provider e-service until it is reactivated

outcome.success: The purpose was published successfully. Warning: if the number of API calls/day exceeds any of the Provider threshold, they will have to manually approve the purpose before it can be used
outcome.error: The purpose could not be published. Please, make sure all required fields are filled and try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose activation
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this purpose will be activated. All the clients added to it will be able to access the Provider e-service by honoring the number of API calls/day established in the purpose itself

outcome.success: The purpose was archived successfully. You can always create new ones
outcome.error: The purpose could not be archived. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm purpose archiving
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this purpose will be archived. All the clients added to it will no longer be able to access the Provider e-service

outcome.success: API calls/day was deleted successfully. You can keep using the purpose with the previous number of API calls per day
outcome.error: The API calls/day update could not be deleted. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm update deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the update to the number of API calls/day for this purpose will be deleted. This purpose can still be used with the former number of API calls/day declared

outcome.success: The purpose was rejected successfully
outcome.error: The purpose could not be rejected. Please, try again!
The risk analysis document could not be downloaded. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The purpose draft was cloned successfully
outcome.error: The purpose could not be cloned. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The client was added successfully to the purpose
outcome.error: The client could not be added to the purpose. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The client was removed successfully from the purpose
outcome.error: The client could not be removed from the purpose. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm client removal from purpose
confirmDialog.description: This client will be removed from the current purpose. All the keys added will no longer be useful to access the Provider e-service for this purpose

outcome.success: The client was created successfully
outcome.error: The client could not be created. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The client was deleted successfully
outcome.error: The client could not be deleted. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm client deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", this client will be deleted. All the keys added to it will also be deleted and will no longer be useful to access the e-services this client is related to

outcome.success: The client was created successfully
outcome.error: The client could not be created. Please, try again!

outcome.success: The key was uploaded successfully. It can now be used to sign a client assertion to obtain a voucher
outcome.error: The key could not be uploaded. Please, make sure it is in the right format and with the right algorithm. Warning: the same key cannot be uploaded twice

outcome.success: The key was deleted successfully. It can no longer be used to sign a client assertion to obtain a voucher
outcome.error: The key could not be deleted. Please, try again!

confirmDialog.title: Confirm public key deletion
confirmDialog.description: By clicking "confirm", the public key will be deleted. Warning: all the services that use this key will no longer be able to access the Provider e-service. If you are not sure, download and save the public key before deleting it

confirmDialog.description: By clicking “Confirm” the user {{userName}} will be removed from the Client Admin API role. This client will no longer be able to write data to the Interop APIs until a new admin is selected.
